notification.name: interfaceDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeLostService
notification.text-message: The %service% service poll on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% failed at %time%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% down on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: nodeAdded

notification.name: interfaceDeleted

notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% deleted.

notification.name: High Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a low threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Low Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold Rearmed

notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Low Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: High Threshold Rearmed
notification.description: A monitored device has recovered from a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has returned to normal on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% with a rearm threshold of %parm[rearm]%. This threshold for this alert was %parm[threshold]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Backbone node added

If this is something you are adding yourself, there's no need to worry. If you don't know where this came from, you should probably figure out what it is.
notification.subject: INFORMATIONAL Haiti PaPNet OpenNMS notice #%noticeid%: New node %nodelabel% at IP address %interface%
